channel.title: Working at The Turing on REG Handbook

item.title: Booking a Meeting Room
item.description: Booking a Meeting Room # There are instructions on how to book a room on Mathison. The simplest way of finding a room is to use the Scheduling Assistant on a meeting invite. Then scroll down to Add Location. This will give you a list of Available Rooms for your specific time. It will update when you move the time window.
